mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user VALUES(null, #{name}, #{id}, SHA2(#{password},512), now(), #{phoneNumber}, #{age}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{address},SHA2(#{key},512)), AES_ENCRYPT(#{email},SHA2(#{key},512)), #{gender}, 0, 0, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT no,name,id,reg_date as regDate,phone_number as phoneNumber,age, convert(AES_DECRYPT(address, SHA2('${key}', 512)) using utf8) as address, convert(AES_DECRYPT(email, SHA2('${key}',512)) using utf8) as email, gender,point,ordercount,role from user where id = #{id} and password=SHA2('${password}', 512);
